00059 void CBookReadWindow::initConnections(){
00060     qWarning("CBookReadWindow::initView()");
00061     CLexiconReadWindow::initConnections();
00062     connect(m_treeChooser, SIGNAL(keyChanged(CSwordKey*)),
00063         this, SLOT(lookup(CSwordKey*)));
00064     connect(m_treeChooser, SIGNAL(keyChanged(CSwordKey*)),
00065         keyChooser(), SLOT(updateKey(CSwordKey*)));
00066     connect(keyChooser(), SIGNAL(keyChanged(CSwordKey*)),
00067         m_treeChooser, SLOT(updateKey(CSwordKey*)));
00068 }
00069 
00071 void CBookReadWindow::initView(){
00072     qWarning("CBookReadWindow::initView()");    
00073     setMainToolBar( new KToolBar(this) );
00074     addDockWindow(mainToolBar());
00075 
00076   QSplitter* splitter = new QSplitter(this);
00077 
00078     setKeyChooser( CKeyChooser::createInstance(modules(), key(), mainToolBar()) );
00079     mainToolBar()->insertWidget(0,keyChooser()->sizeHint().width(),keyChooser());   
00080     mainToolBar()->setItemAutoSized(0);
00081 
00082   m_treeAction = new KToggleAction(i18n("Toggle tree..."), ICON_VIEW_BOOKTREE, IDK_PRESENTER_TOGGLE_TREE, this, SLOT(treeToggled()), actionCollection(), "treeToggle_action");
00083 //  m_treeAction->setWhatsThis( WT_PRESENTER_SYNC );
00084     m_treeAction->plug(mainToolBar());
00085 
00086     setModuleChooserBar( new CModuleChooserBar(modules(), modules().first()->type(), this) );
00087     moduleChooserBar()->setButtonLimit(1);
00088   addDockWindow( moduleChooserBar() );
00089 
00090     m_treeChooser = new CBookTreeChooser(modules(), key(), splitter);
00091 
00092   setDisplayWidget( CDisplay::createReadInstance(this, splitter) );         
00093 
00094   m_treeAction->setChecked(false);
00095     m_treeChooser->hide();
00096     
00097   splitter->setResizeMode(m_treeChooser, QSplitter::FollowSizeHint);
00098 
00099   setCentralWidget( splitter );
00100     setIcon(CToolClass::getIconForModule(modules().first()));
00101 
00102 }
00103 
00105 void CBookReadWindow::setupPopupMenu(){
00106     qWarning("CBookReadWindow::setupPopupMenu()");
00107     CLexiconReadWindow::setupPopupMenu();
00108 }
00109 
00111 void CBookReadWindow::treeToggled(){
00112     if (m_treeAction->isChecked())
00113         m_treeChooser->show();
00114     else
00115         m_treeChooser->hide();
00116 }
00117 
00119 void CBookReadWindow::modulesChanged(){
00120   CLexiconReadWindow::modulesChanged();
00121   m_treeChooser->setModules(modules());
00122 }
